review: I had undergone root canal surgery and crowns,my  smile is perfectly corrected. I highly recommend Dr karthik for going painless root canal surgeries. I didn't expect that would be this much easy.I am really thankful for getting this done without any stress, already I had some dental treatments but was not satisfied but I really suggest Dr karthik and the entire team for going any dental health treatments, they are very friendly and very patient in handling all the process. The trust they have given before starting the treatment is really appreciable. Definitely going to any treatments we may feel bad sometimes but I felt more comfortable here. To be very honest  I didn't get any pain or uneasiness anytime. The first day Dr karthik gave me a word it's easy and I will take care you just relax.It happened exactly and I am very grateful for correcting my smile and giving back my confidence again. The entire teams gave me great positivity and the clinic is so calm always. Dr Karthik always listened to my concerns how I am expecting my teeth to be, definitely I am very happy and satisfied. The hygienic environment and the positivity in your clinic is appreciable. Great work team, thank you. All the best
reply_text:
Thank you Manisha for such a wonderful review about the whole process. Really glad that we were able to help you out and give you the best possible outcome taking into consideration all your previous dental experiences. Thank you for being so cooperative throughout and for trusting us. Truly appreciate it.
Keep Smiling!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Extremely happy with the dental treatment I recently received at Toothflora. 
I was initially  apprehensive but  Dr Kartik put me at ease by explaining every step of the procedure in very simple terms. He also was kind enough to  accommodate me for an appointment  inspite of a short notice .Throughout the procedure, he took utmost care to see i was comfortable. The root canal procedure was surprisingly painless and recovery period was without any issue. 
This experience has sure changed my apprehensions towards dental treatments.
I would definitely recommend Dr Kartik and his team for any dental procedures required. You can be rest assured that you will recieve prompt and totally painless dental treatment!
reply_text: Thank you ma'am for trusting us and for the kind words. Much appreciated.

review: I visited Dr Kartik to get my missing front teeth issue resolved. I was on a strict timeline of two week as I had a few weddings to attend. Dr Kartik attended to my case with priority where he performed the root canals for the required teeth and replaced the missing teeth with a bridge. My smile is restored and I'm very grateful to doctor.
reply_text: Thank you ma'am for trusting us throughout the process and for these  wonderful words. It was indeed our pleasure to treat you at our clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a terrible experience with other Dentist earlier, but I was relieved to find that Toothflora clinic made my recent root canal treatment very comfortable. Dr. Karthik was very reassuring and attentive to my concerns, always making sure that he made me feel comfortable throughout the procedure.
Overall, I'd definitely recommend this practice to anyone looking for dental work because they make you feel at ease from the moment you walk in the door!
reply_text:
Thank you Aniket for trusting us and for these wonderful words. Truly appreciate it!
You were very patient with us throughout the multiple procedures that we carried out which made our job a lot lot easier.
So a Big Thank you to you as well!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very good treatment was very satisfied with the doctor's treatment was very friendly I would suggest others to visit the clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
The procedure of Wisdom tooth extraction has been very smooth. The doctor is very professional, understanding, caring and a delight to visit. 
Proper explanation of the process at each step and approachable for any questions.
Thank you Doctor!!

I took my mother for root canal treatment at toothflora!! Doctor Karthik was extremely professional, caring and was above and beyond in providing the treatment!!Doctor Karthik treats his patients like his family which was very heartfelt!!
reply_text: Thank you so much Praveen for trusting us. Your mother was extremely cooperative and patient with us throughout which made our jobs a lot, lot easier. Truly appreciate the kind words from you. Means a lot!

review: Took my mother for teeth pain  which  she was very reluctant to get treated due to the fear of dentists. Dr Kartik was very calm with her and took care of the treatment with utmost ease. Very satisfied overall.
reply_text: Thank you ma'am for your kind and encouraging words. Appreciate it!

review:
Excellent experience with Doctor Karthik. It's not that I just got the procedure done, but I was given the complete information beforehand as to why is the particular procedure being undertaken.

Dr Karthik is extremely professional and patient with his clients.
reply_text: Thank you Laxman for your kind words. A special thanks for being so co-operative throughout the process which made the treatment go very smoothly.
